div.p: List of the sowing ... indiction, of 70 artabas of wheat ... Abraamios and –lachie artabas ... Apollos, tak–(?) artabas ... Phileas, black artabas ... Ioannes (son of?) Magas artabas ... Barous ... Aleus artabas ... Thekla, wife of the priest artabas ... Pauli, deacon artabas ... Mataei artabas ... Patap ... Phoibammon and Ioannes ... Eulogios ... Lamason (Pamout?) ... Translation: N. Gonis, P. Harr. 3 298
